hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Wallet#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Requiem of Spirit#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #6# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #the Stone of Agony# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Happy Mask Shop#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #4# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Prescription# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #the Boomerang#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #7# major items.
